page.title: 01SUMMARY ERDINGTON
page.content: The area we have covered is part of a large residential suburb of Birmingham As such it is fairly uniform in character, consisting of houses, both council owned and private, and amenities such as parks, sports grounds and shopping centres. Of course there have been changes over the years not only in the environment but in the people who come to live here. As a large industrial city, Birmingham has always attracted people who come to live and work here. Amongst those who have made their homes here are people from all over Britain and major ethnic groups including West Indians, Asians and Chinese. No major industry is situated in our part of Erdington although nearby there are many large factories. In our part of Erdington small factories can be found.
